div.p: We are excited to announce the speaker lineup for CoderCruise 2019. Now for the 3rd year the team behind the original php[cruise] is bringing a conference to the open seas. CoderCruise 2019 is a premiere conference experience, giving you an exclusive connection to your fellow community members. It will set sail from Port Canaveral on August 19th for a 5 day cruise that also visits Princess Cays and Nassau!

Ticket sales are currently open and just like last year we've negotiated a low rate for our participants that is all inclusive, starting as low as $435 per person (including 5-day cruise, food, drink and the conference!)
